property.name: description_key
property.value: Here is the detail for this heist. You can abandon this heist whenever you find it too hard for you.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Alright, newcomer. Lets kick start your very first needed: consumables and weapon suplies. Things had changes. You wont find those luxury that easy now, but i know just the location. There you will find a clues for loot room location, bring back to us and we will share you some. Watch out those zeds.

property.name: completion_key
property.value: That was not so hard after all, right? We are looking forward for the next objective with yer, friend.

property.name: description_key
property.value: Here is the detail for this heist. A bit harder than last one, dont push yourself too hard, retreat if thing go wrong.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: You doing well lately, I can give you the more difficult one. Slay those zeds and looking for the clues of loot room. Simple enough ?

property.name: completion_key
property.value: Great job, survivor! We can barely make it with those supply. Here is your reward.

property.name: description_key
property.value: Here is the detail for this heist. This is a big one, I dont want to see you hang out with those zeds. Stay safe, survivor.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: This one tough. Really, harder than any heist you have done. But, the reward is huge, we can feed the intire barrack!

property.name: completion_key
property.value: I know I can rely on you, survivor. Those supply is alots, we can help other one with this supply now. Great job, survivor!
